ERC1400 with nonce-based certificate controller logic","methods":{"allowance(address,address)":{"details":"Check the value of tokens that an owner allowed to a spender.","params":{"owner":"address The address which owns the funds.","spender":"address The address which will spend the funds."},"return":"A uint256 specifying the value of tokens still available for the spender."},"allowanceByPartition(bytes32,address,address)":{"details":"Check the value of tokens that an owner allowed to a spender.","params":{"owner":"address The address which owns the funds.","partition":"Name of the partition.","spender":"address The address which will spend the funds."},"return":"A uint256 specifying the value of tokens still available for the spender."},"approve(address,uint256)":{"details":"Approve the passed address to spend the specified amount of tokens on behalf of 'msg.sender'.","params":{"spender":"The address which will spend the funds.","value":"The amount of tokens to be spent."},"return":"A boolean that indicates if the operation was successful."},"approveByPartition(bytes32,address,uint256)":{"details":"Approve the passed address to spend the specified amount of tokens on behalf of 'msg.sender'.","params":{"partition":"Name of the partition.","spender":"The address which will spend the funds.","value":"The amount of tokens to be spent."},"return":"A boolean that indicates if the operation was successful."},"authorizeOperator(address)":{"details":"Set a third party operator address as an operator of 'msg.sender' to transfer and redeem tokens on its behalf.","params":{"operator":"Address to set as an operator for 'msg.sender'."}},"authorizeOperatorByPartition(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Set 'operator' as an operator for 'msg.sender' for a given partition.","params":{"operator":"Address to set as an operator for 'msg.sender'.","partition":"Name of the partition."}},"balanceOf(address)":{"details":"Get the balance of the account with address 'tokenHolder'.","params":{"tokenHolder":"Address for which the balance is returned."},"return":"Amount of token held by 'tokenHolder' in the token contract."},"balanceOfByPartition(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Get balance of a tokenholder for a specific partition.","params":{"partition":"Name of the partition.","tokenHolder":"Address for which the balance is returned."},"return":"Amount of token of partition 'partition' held by 'tokenHolder' in the token contract."},"canOperatorTransferByPartition(bytes32,address,address,uint256,bytes,bytes)":{"details":"Know the reason on success or failure based on the EIP-1066 application-specific status codes.","params":{"data":"Information attached to the transfer. [CAN CONTAIN THE DESTINATION PARTITION]","from":"Token holder.","operatorData":"Information attached to the transfer, by the operator. [CONTAINS THE CONDITIONAL OWNERSHIP CERTIFICATE]","partition":"Name of the partition.","to":"Token recipient.","value":"Number of tokens to transfer."},"return":"ESC (Ethereum Status Code) following the EIP-1066 standard.Additional bytes32 parameter that can be used to define application specific reason codes with additional details (for example the transfer restriction rule responsible for making the transfer operation invalid).Destination partition."},"canTransferByPartition(bytes32,address,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"Know the reason on success or failure based on the EIP-1066 application-specific status codes.","params":{"data":"Information attached to the transfer, by the token holder. [CONTAINS THE CONDITIONAL OWNERSHIP CERTIFICATE]","partition":"Name of the partition.","to":"Token recipient.","value":"Number of tokens to transfer."},"return":"ESC (Ethereum Status Code) following the EIP-1066 standard.Additional bytes32 parameter that can be used to define application specific reason codes with additional details (for example the transfer restriction rule responsible for making the transfer operation invalid).Destination partition."},"constructor":{"details":"Initialize ERC1400 + initialize certificate controller.","params":{"certificateActivated":"If set to 'true', the certificate controller is activated at contract creation.","certificateSigner":"Address of the off-chain service which signs the conditional ownership certificates required for token transfers, issuance, redemption (Cf. CertificateController.sol).","controllers":"Array of initial controllers.","defaultPartitions":"Partitions chosen by default, when partition is not specified, like the case ERC20 tranfers.","extension":"Address of token extension.","granularity":"Granularity of the token.","name":"Name of the token.","newOwner":"Address whom contract ownership shall be transferred to.","symbol":"Symbol of the token."}},"controllers()":{"details":"Get the list of controllers as defined by the token contract.","return":"List of addresses of all the controllers."},"controllersByPartition(bytes32)":{"details":"Get controllers for a given partition.","params":{"partition":"Name of the partition."},"return":"Array of controllers for partition."},"decimals()":{"details":"Get the number of decimals of the token.","return":"The number of decimals of the token. For retrocompatibility, decimals are forced to 18 in ERC1400."},"getDefaultPartitions()":{"details":"Get default partitions to transfer from. Function used for ERC20 retrocompatibility. For example, a security token may return the bytes32(\"unrestricted\").","return":"Array of default partitions."},"getDocument(bytes32)":{"details":"Access a document associated with the token.","params":{"name":"Short name (represented as a bytes32) associated to the document."},"return":"Requested document + document hash."},"granularity()":{"details":"Get the smallest part of the token that\u2019s not divisible.","return":"The smallest non-divisible part of the token."},"isControllable()":{"details":"Know if the token can be controlled by operators. If a token returns 'false' for 'isControllable()'' then it MUST always return 'false' in the future.","return":"bool 'true' if the token can still be controlled by operators, 'false' if it can't anymore."},"isIssuable()":{"details":"Know if new tokens can be issued in the future.","return":"bool 'true' if tokens can still be issued by the issuer, 'false' if they can't anymore."},"isOperator(address,address)":{"details":"Indicate whether the operator address is an operator of the tokenHolder address.","params":{"operator":"Address which may be an operator of tokenHolder.","tokenHolder":"Address of a token holder which may have the operator address as an operator."},"return":"'true' if operator is an operator of 'tokenHolder' and 'false' otherwise."},"isOperatorForPartition(bytes32,address,address)":{"details":"Indicate whether the operator address is an operator of the tokenHolder address for the given partition.","params":{"operator":"Address which may be an operator of tokenHolder for the given partition.","partition":"Name of the partition.","tokenHolder":"Address of a token holder which may have the operator address as an operator for the given partition."},"return":"'true' if 'operator' is an operator of 'tokenHolder' for partition 'partition' and 'false' otherwise."},"isOwner()":{"return":"true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract."},"issue(address,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"Issue tokens from default partition.","params":{"data":"Information attached to the issuance, by the issuer.","tokenHolder":"Address for which we want to issue tokens.","value":"Number of tokens issued."}},"issueByPartition(bytes32,address,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"Issue tokens from a specific partition.","params":{"data":"Information attached to the issuance, by the issuer.","partition":"Name of the partition.","tokenHolder":"Address for which we want to issue tokens.","value":"Number of tokens issued."}},"migrate(address,bool)":{"details":"Migrate contract.   * ===> CAUTION: DEFINITIVE ACTION    * This function shall be called once a new version of the smart contract has been created. Once this function is called: - The address of the new smart contract is set in ERC1820 registry - If the choice is definitive, the current smart contract is turned off and can never be used again","params":{"definitive":"If set to 'true' the contract is turned off definitely.","newContractAddress":"Address of the new version of the smart contract."}},"name()":{"details":"Get the name of the token, e.g., \"MyToken\".","return":"Name of the token."},"operatorRedeemByPartition(bytes32,address,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"Redeem tokens of a specific partition.","params":{"operatorData":"Information attached to the redemption, by the operator.","partition":"Name of the partition.","tokenHolder":"Address for which we want to redeem tokens.","value":"Number of tokens redeemed"}},"operatorTransferByPartition(bytes32,address,address,uint256,bytes,bytes)":{"details":"Transfer tokens from a specific partition through an operator.","params":{"data":"Information attached to the transfer. [CAN CONTAIN THE DESTINATION PARTITION]","from":"Token holder.","operatorData":"Information attached to the transfer, by the operator.","partition":"Name of the partition.","to":"Token recipient.","value":"Number of tokens to transfer."},"return":"Destination partition."},"owner()":{"return":"the address of the owner."},"partitionsOf(address)":{"details":"Get partitions index of a tokenholder.","params":{"tokenHolder":"Address for which the partitions index are returned."},"return":"Array of partitions index of 'tokenHolder'."},"redeem(uint256,bytes)":{"details":"Redeem the amount of tokens from the address 'msg.sender'.","params":{"data":"Information attached to the redemption, by the token holder.","value":"Number of tokens to redeem."}},"redeemByPartition(bytes32,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"Redeem tokens of a specific partition.","params":{"data":"Information attached to the redemption, by the redeemer.","partition":"Name of the partition.","value":"Number of tokens redeemed."}},"redeemFrom(address,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"Redeem the amount of tokens on behalf of the address from.","params":{"data":"Information attached to the redemption.","from":"Token holder whose tokens will be redeemed (or address(0) to set from to msg.sender).","value":"Number of tokens to redeem."}},"renounceControl()":{"details":"Definitely renounce the possibility to control tokens on behalf of tokenHolders. Once set to false, '_isControllable' can never be set to 'true' again."},"renounceIssuance()":{"details":"Definitely renounce the possibility to issue new tokens. Once set to false, '_isIssuable' can never be set to 'true' again."},"renounceOwnership()":{"details":"Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract."},"revokeOperator(address)":{"details":"Remove the right of the operator address to be an operator for 'msg.sender' and to transfer and redeem tokens on its behalf.","params":{"operator":"Address to rescind as an operator for 'msg.sender'."}},"revokeOperatorByPartition(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Remove the right of the operator address to be an operator on a given partition for 'msg.sender' and to transfer and redeem tokens on its behalf.","params":{"operator":"Address to rescind as an operator on given partition for 'msg.sender'.","partition":"Name of the partition."}},"setControllers(address[])":{"details":"Set list of token controllers.","params":{"operators":"Controller addresses."}},"setDefaultPartitions(bytes32[])":{"details":"Set default partitions to transfer from. Function used for ERC20 retrocompatibility.","params":{"partitions":"partitions to use by default when not specified."}},"setDocument(bytes32,string,bytes32)":{"details":"Associate a document with the token.","params":{"documentHash":"Hash of the document [optional parameter].","name":"Short name (represented as a bytes32) associated to the document.","uri":"Document content."}},"setPartitionControllers(bytes32,address[])":{"details":"Set list of token partition controllers.","params":{"operators":"Controller addresses.","partition":"Name of the partition."}},"setTokenExtension(address,string,bool,bool,bool)":{"details":"Set token extension contract address. The extension contract can for example verify \"ERC1400TokensValidator\" or \"ERC1400TokensChecker\" interfaces. If the extension is an \"ERC1400TokensValidator\", it will be called everytime a transfer is executed.","params":{"addControllerRoleForExtension":"If set to 'true', the extension contract will be added as controller.","addMinterRoleForExtension":"If set to 'true', the extension contract will be added as minter.","extension":"Address of the extension contract.","interfaceLabel":"Interface label of extension contract.","removeOldExtensionRoles":"If set to 'true', the roles of the old extension(minter, controller) will be removed extension."}},"symbol()":{"details":"Get the symbol of the token, e.g., \"MYT\".","return":"Symbol of the token."},"totalPartitions()":{"details":"Get list of existing partitions.","return":"Array of all exisiting partitions."},"totalSupply()":{"details":"Get the total number of issued tokens.","return":"Total supply of tokens currently in circulation."},"totalSupplyByPartition(bytes32)":{"details":"Get the total number of issued tokens for a given partition.","params":{"partition":"Name of the partition."},"return":"Total supply of tokens currently in circulation, for a given partition."},"transfer(address,uint256)":{"details":"Transfer token for a specified address.","params":{"to":"The address to transfer to.","value":"The value to be transferred."},"return":"A boolean that indicates if the operation was successful."},"transferByPartition(bytes32,address,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"Transfer tokens from a specific partition.","params":{"data":"Information attached to the transfer, by the token holder.","partition":"Name of the partition.","to":"Token recipient.","value":"Number of tokens to transfer."},"return":"Destination partition."},"transferFrom(address,address,uint256)":{"details":"Transfer tokens from one address to another.","params":{"from":"The address which you want to transfer tokens from.","to":"The address which you want to transfer to.","value":"The amount of tokens to be transferred."},"return":"A boolean that indicates if the operation was successful."},"transferFromWithData(address,address,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"Transfer the amount of tokens on behalf of the address 'from' to the address 'to'.","params":{"data":"Information attached to the transfer, and intended for the token holder ('from').","from":"Token holder (or 'address(0)' to set from to 'msg.sender').","to":"Token recipient.","value":"Number of tokens to transfer."}},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.","params":{"newOwner":"The address to transfer ownership to."}},"transferWithData(address,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"Transfer the amount of tokens from the address 'msg.sender' to the address 'to'.","params":{"data":"Information attached to the transfer, by the token holder.","to":"Token recipient.","value":"Number of tokens to transfer."}}},"title":"ERC1400HoldableCertificateNonceToken"},"userdoc":{"methods":{"renounceOwnership()":{"notice":"Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore."}}}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"universal-token/contracts/certificate/ERC1400HoldableCertificateToken.sol":"ERC1400HoldableCertificateToken"},"evmVersion":"petersburg","libraries":{},"optimizer":{"enabled":true,"runs":0},"remappings":[]},"sources":{"erc1820/contracts/ERC1820Client.sol":{"keccak256":"0x69850e8790fc3db1f19370ce50f7fdbabadc41567c1a62361de42640de0612ec","urls":["bzzr://c13b1459b34f2d29b86dafa3bf5353b1e0dea15ecca1698f6760a1ac87dc1add","dweb:/ipfs/QmaaS1oVPdEiUVmh1hAcfG3hbmRe5RnVpRHtccJKrUJQ37"]},"openzeppelin-solidity/contracts/access/Roles.sol":{"keccak256":"0x659ba0f9a3392cd50a8a5fafaf5dfd8c6a0878f6a4613bceff4e90dceddcd865","urls":["bzzr://f704341d520fbc98716541f1b3f67737f0ee6e94adf072a66acb2bd25d593c2b","dweb:/ipfs/QmcmyB4cNazZ1sw963Afaijt67M9bDgwmGXCgQajGTD4tm"]},"openzeppelin-solidity/contracts/math/SafeMath.sol":{"keccak256":"0x965012d27b4262d7a41f5028cbb30c51ebd9ecd4be8fb30380aaa7a3c64fbc8b","urls":["bzzr://41ca38f6b0fa4b77b0feec43e422cfbec48b7eb38a41edf0b85c77e8d9a296b1","dweb:/ipfs/QmbMdvSXcqGKxeeYvzF3VrWpoHQyVzMXBhzhAokF2Gdymv"]},"openzeppelin-solidity/contracts/ownership/Ownable.sol":{"keccak256":"0x980de387a1a020a498f53d00f89fecebb12c949a17e8f160093c0303ede2b786","urls":["bzzr://08894efa2a557982070beda6a81a032407e70532d24bdafe80d39660c74904d9","dweb:/ipfs/QmeN3ZiYGSjCnQFeYaJNgoXjF9eDue1g3e9pqManRkeBtV"]},"openzeppelin-solidity/contracts/token/ERC20/IERC20.sol":{"keccak256":"0x079c4e23ee448f529e43bfa3c4e8fb4be52cd0318ee923a276835bedf45b93d8","urls":["bzzr://48248e86f64407a95f241d6c5c8cfea6b4d4ebf4ebb467e5c98c8af3868fafe4","dweb:/ipfs/QmdxqtgEFZjHCoiYyz6pUAQ5iBm7As25jcyEbZoTaAgyDa"]},"universal-token/contracts/ERC1400.sol":{"keccak256":"0x617439bfcbbc138c3cd6290ede6db752dedb5430098618af17e7d2a088f85d4c","urls":["bzzr://bdb4d81200308dc416fd0d5fe92469801fa43aabb9817792ca307fcbb31a3446","dweb:/ipfs/Qme6y5AwTwG6Arg5TWegYgDCzAGPVfB5haATsiznFXBcbk"]},"universal-token/contracts/IERC1400.sol":{"keccak256":"0x4d304a8029e4687af5eb64f5c8c2 nodes.documentation:
@title ERC1400HoldableCertificateNonceToken

canTransferByPartition

devdoc.details: Holdable ERC1400 with nonce-based certificate controller logic

allowance(address,address).details: Check the value of tokens that an owner allowed to a spender.

params.owner: address The address which owns the funds.
params.spender: address The address which will spend the funds.

allowance(address,address).return: A uint256 specifying the value of tokens still available for the spender.

allowanceByPartition(bytes32,address,add.details: Check the value of tokens that an owner allowed to a spender.

params.owner: address The address which owns the funds.
params.spender: address The address which will spend the funds.

allowanceByPartition(bytes32,address,add.return: A uint256 specifying the value of tokens still available for the spender.

approve(address,uint256).details: Approve the passed address to spend the specified amount of tokens on behalf of 'msg.sender'.

params.spender: The address which will spend the funds.
params.value: The amount of tokens to be spent.

approve(address,uint256).return: A boolean that indicates if the operation was successful.

approveByPartition(bytes32,address,uint2.details: Approve the passed address to spend the specified amount of tokens on behalf of 'msg.sender'.

params.spender: The address which will spend the funds.
params.value: The amount of tokens to be spent.

approveByPartition(bytes32,address,uint2.return: A boolean that indicates if the operation was successful.

authorizeOperator(address).details: Set a third party operator address as an operator of 'msg.sender' to transfer and redeem tokens on its behalf.

params.operator: Address to set as an operator for 'msg.sender'.

authorizeOperatorByPartition(bytes32,add.details: Set 'operator' as an operator for 'msg.sender' for a given partition.

params.operator: Address to set as an operator for 'msg.sender'.

balanceOf(address).details: Get the balance of the account with address 'tokenHolder'.

params.tokenHolder: Address for which the balance is returned.

balanceOf(address).return: Amount of token held by 'tokenHolder' in the token contract.

balanceOfByPartition(bytes32,address).details: Get balance of a tokenholder for a specific partition.

params.tokenHolder: Address for which the balance is returned.

balanceOfByPartition(bytes32,address).return: Amount of token of partition 'partition' held by 'tokenHolder' in the token contract.

canOperatorTransferByPartition(bytes32,a.details: Know the reason on success or failure based on the EIP-1066 application-specific status codes.

params.data: Information attached to the transfer. [CAN CONTAIN THE DESTINATION PARTITION]
params.operatorData: Information attached to the transfer, by the operator. [CONTAINS THE CONDITIONAL OWNERSHIP CERTIFICATE]

canOperatorTransferByPartition(bytes32,a.return: ESC (Ethereum Status Code) following the EIP-1066 standard.Additional bytes32 parameter that can be used to define application specific reason codes with additional details (for example the transfer restriction rule responsible for making the transfer operation invalid).Destination partition.

canTransferByPartition(bytes32,address,u.details: Know the reason on success or failure based on the EIP-1066 application-specific status codes.

params.data: Information attached to the transfer, by the token holder. [CONTAINS THE CONDITIONAL OWNERSHIP CERTIFICATE]

canTransferByPartition(bytes32,address,u.return: ESC (Ethereum Status Code) following the EIP-1066 standard.Additional bytes32 parameter that can be used to define application specific reason codes with additional details (for example the transfer restriction rule responsible for making the transfer operation invalid).Destination partition.

params.certificateActivated: If set to 'true', the certificate controller is activated at contract creation.
params.certificateSigner: Address of the off-chain service which signs the conditional ownership certificates required for token transfers, issuance, redemption (Cf. CertificateController.sol).
params.defaultPartitions: Partitions chosen by default, when partition is not specified, like the case ERC20 tranfers.
params.name: Name of the token.
params.newOwner: Address whom contract ownership shall be transferred to.

controllers().details: Get the list of controllers as defined by the token contract.
controllers().return: List of addresses of all the controllers.

controllersByPartition(bytes32).details: Get controllers for a given partition.

decimals().details: Get the number of decimals of the token.
decimals().return: The number of decimals of the token. For retrocompatibility, decimals are forced to 18 in ERC1400.

getDefaultPartitions().details: Get default partitions to transfer from. Function used for ERC20 retrocompatibility. For example, a security token may return the bytes32("unrestricted").

getDocument(bytes32).details: Access a document associated with the token.

params.name: Short name (represented as a bytes32) associated to the document.

granularity().details: Get the smallest part of the token thats not divisible.
granularity().return: The smallest non-divisible part of the token.

isControllable().details: Know if the token can be controlled by operators. If a token returns 'false' for 'isControllable()'' then it MUST always return 'false' in the future.
isControllable().return: bool 'true' if the token can still be controlled by operators, 'false' if it can't anymore.

isIssuable().details: Know if new tokens can be issued in the future.
isIssuable().return: bool 'true' if tokens can still be issued by the issuer, 'false' if they can't anymore.

isOperator(address,address).details: Indicate whether the operator address is an operator of the tokenHolder address.

params.operator: Address which may be an operator of tokenHolder.
params.tokenHolder: Address of a token holder which may have the operator address as an operator.

isOperator(address,address).return: 'true' if operator is an operator of 'tokenHolder' and 'false' otherwise.

isOperatorForPartition(bytes32,address,a.details: Indicate whether the operator address is an operator of the tokenHolder address for the given partition.

params.operator: Address which may be an operator of tokenHolder for the given partition.
params.tokenHolder: Address of a token holder which may have the operator address as an operator for the given partition.

isOperatorForPartition(bytes32,address,a.return: 'true' if 'operator' is an operator of 'tokenHolder' for partition 'partition' and 'false' otherwise.

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

params.data: Information attached to the issuance, by the issuer.
params.tokenHolder: Address for which we want to issue tokens.

issueByPartition(bytes32,address,uint256.details: Issue tokens from a specific partition.

params.data: Information attached to the issuance, by the issuer.
params.tokenHolder: Address for which we want to issue tokens.

migrate(address,bool).details: Migrate contract.   * ===> CAUTION: DEFINITIVE ACTION    * This function shall be called once a new version of the smart contract has been created. Once this function is called: - The address of the new smart contract is set in ERC1820 registry - If the choice is definitive, the current smart contract is turned off and can never be used again

params.definitive: If set to 'true' the contract is turned off definitely.
params.newContractAddress: Address of the new version of the smart contract.

name().details: Get the name of the token, e.g., "MyToken".

operatorRedeemByPartition(bytes32,addres.details: Redeem tokens of a specific partition.

params.operatorData: Information attached to the redemption, by the operator.
params.tokenHolder: Address for which we want to redeem tokens.

operatorTransferByPartition(bytes32,addr.details: Transfer tokens from a specific partition through an operator.

params.data: Information attached to the transfer. [CAN CONTAIN THE DESTINATION PARTITION]
params.operatorData: Information attached to the transfer, by the operator.

partitionsOf(address).details: Get partitions index of a tokenholder.

params.tokenHolder: Address for which the partitions index are returned.

redeem(uint256,bytes).details: Redeem the amount of tokens from the address 'msg.sender'.

params.data: Information attached to the redemption, by the token holder.

redeemByPartition(bytes32,uint256,bytes).details: Redeem tokens of a specific partition.

params.data: Information attached to the redemption, by the redeemer.

redeemFrom(address,uint256,bytes).details: Redeem the amount of tokens on behalf of the address from.

params.from: Token holder whose tokens will be redeemed (or address(0) to set from to msg.sender).

renounceControl().details: Definitely renounce the possibility to control tokens on behalf of tokenHolders. Once set to false, '_isControllable' can never be set to 'true' again.

renounceIssuance().details: Definitely renounce the possibility to issue new tokens. Once set to false, '_isIssuable' can never be set to 'true' again.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

revokeOperator(address).details: Remove the right of the operator address to be an operator for 'msg.sender' and to transfer and redeem tokens on its behalf.

params.operator: Address to rescind as an operator for 'msg.sender'.

revokeOperatorByPartition(bytes32,addres.details: Remove the right of the operator address to be an operator on a given partition for 'msg.sender' and to transfer and redeem tokens on its behalf.

params.operator: Address to rescind as an operator on given partition for 'msg.sender'.

setDefaultPartitions(bytes32[]).details: Set default partitions to transfer from. Function used for ERC20 retrocompatibility.

params.partitions: partitions to use by default when not specified.

setDocument(bytes32,string,bytes32).details: Associate a document with the token.

params.name: Short name (represented as a bytes32) associated to the document.

setPartitionControllers(bytes32,address[.details: Set list of token partition controllers.

setTokenExtension(address,string,bool,bo.details: Set token extension contract address. The extension contract can for example verify "ERC1400TokensValidator" or "ERC1400TokensChecker" interfaces. If the extension is an "ERC1400TokensValidator", it will be called everytime a transfer is executed.

params.addControllerRoleForExtension: If set to 'true', the extension contract will be added as controller.
params.addMinterRoleForExtension: If set to 'true', the extension contract will be added as minter.
params.removeOldExtensionRoles: If set to 'true', the roles of the old extension(minter, controller) will be removed extension.

symbol().details: Get the symbol of the token, e.g., "MYT".

totalSupply().details: Get the total number of issued tokens.
totalSupply().return: Total supply of tokens currently in circulation.

totalSupplyByPartition(bytes32).details: Get the total number of issued tokens for a given partition.
totalSupplyByPartition(bytes32).return: Total supply of tokens currently in circulation, for a given partition.

transfer(address,uint256).details: Transfer token for a specified address.
transfer(address,uint256).return: A boolean that indicates if the operation was successful.

transferByPartition(bytes32,address,uint.details: Transfer tokens from a specific partition.

params.data: Information attached to the transfer, by the token holder.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: Transfer tokens from one address to another.

params.from: The address which you want to transfer tokens from.
params.to: The address which you want to transfer to.
params.value: The amount of tokens to be transferred.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).return: A boolean that indicates if the operation was successful.

transferFromWithData(address,address,uin.details: Transfer the amount of tokens on behalf of the address 'from' to the address 'to'.

params.data: Information attached to the transfer, and intended for the token holder ('from').
params.from: Token holder (or 'address(0)' to set from to 'msg.sender').

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

transferWithData(address,uint256,bytes).details: Transfer the amount of tokens from the address 'msg.sender' to the address 'to'.

params.data: Information attached to the transfer, by the token holder.

devdoc.title: ERC1400HoldableCertificateNonceToken

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.
